comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Elaine Vladimirovna Zworykin Knudsen (1926-2011), daughter of Tatiana and Vladimir Zworykin. Earned a BS in geology at the University of Illinois. Married the year this photo was taken, to US Navy officer Louie Brodsgaard Knudsen (b. 1920). The couple had four children; they lived in Pasadena after 1964, and in Montana after 1993. Her gravesite: www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=89991633 Her famous father's gravesite: www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=103484571
